attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To stop any further payments to the E.U Budget ,until such time that they are able to account for all previous years (balance the account),and to make the E.U Parliment more accountable for the expences of its members and the running of Parliment.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
